channel.title: [508] Need a little help with basic objectoption thieving[508]

item.title: [508] Need a little help with basic objectoption thieving[508]
item.dc:creator: @fashofasho fashofasho
item.description:
@fashofasho wrote:

alright so i have 4 stalls set up and i have added these codes in objectoption1.java but nothing is happening when i try to steal from the stalls?? any help would be greatly appreciated!

case 4876: Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 946, 1); p.appendExperience(3000, 17); p.setCoords(3085, 3498, 0); break; case 4877: Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 563, 25); p.appendExperience(6000, 17); p.setCoords(3085, 3495, 0); break; case 4875: Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 380, 10); p.appendExperience(8000, 17); p.setCoords(3085, 3492, 0); break; case 4878: Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1323, 1); p.appendExperience(10000, 17); p.setCoords(3085, 3489, 0); break;

Read full topic
